name: SpaceSea Defender
description: GameDevNetwork: DragonJam. This is my first mini game (2D) created in my first game dev jam. I have only learned unity for about more than a month almost 2 months, so feedback is welcome :) This game is a shooting game in which the canon has to protect its base located under the sea from falling meteorite. Survive the waves and see how many points you can get in total. All the resources are created from scratch.
